title: Handle Mobile Ticket Transfer
description: A fan wants to transfer their ticket for a game to a friend.

tasks.description: Guide the fan on how to use the 'transfer' feature in the team's mobile app.
The fan enters their friend's email address to send the ticket.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system sends a transfer offer to the friend.

tasks.description: Monitor the system to confirm the friend has accepted the transfer and the ticket is now in their account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the transfer was completed successfully.
